item.title: Next | Hexo主题的多种样式配置
item.description: 添加404界面 在source文件夹新建404.html，内容如下： --- layout: false title: "404" --- <!DOCTYPE HTML> <html> <head> <title>404 - No-Sky'blog</title> <meta name="description" content="404错误，页面不存在！"> <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8;"/> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1" /> <meta name="robots" content="all" /> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow"/> </head> <body>
